DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate image quality segmentation performance Topcon 's DRI OCT Triton device use two light source .
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate image quality segmentation performance Topcon 's DRI OCT Triton device use two light source equivalent specification : micro-electro-mechanical short cavity tunable laser micro-electro-mechanical tunable vertical cavity surface emit laser .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Participants must least 18 year age 2 . They must able complete testing ( OCT scan ) 3 . They must volunteer study sign consent form Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subject history ocular disease ocular pathology 2 . Subjects unable complete OCT imaging mode
